content:
You're welcome! I'm glad I could help. It's great to hear that you've already taken courses on another online learning platform, which will likely help you with the math prerequisites. Having a solid foundation in linear algebra and calculus will definitely make it easier to understand the concepts in the Stanford NLP with Deep Learning Specialization.

Remember, reviewing the math prerequisites is an investment in your understanding of the course material. Take your time, practice regularly, and don't hesitate to reach out if you have any questions or need further clarification on any concepts.

Once you feel comfortable with the math prerequisites, you'll be able to dive into the course with confidence and focus on learning the exciting concepts of NLP with deep learning. If you have any more questions or need further guidance, feel free to ask.

Good luck with your review, and I hope you enjoy the course!
